Activity: Check emails, respond to messages and start looking into visual polish of character models and animations.
Review existing character models and animations in the game. Identify areas where visual polish is needed, such as textures, lighting, and animation smoothness. Make some notes.
Experiment with different post-processing effects to enhance the visual fidelity of the character models. Adjust bloom, contrast, and color grading to achieve a desired look.

Work with the animation team (indirectly, through notes/suggestions) to refine existing character animations. Focus on improving the fluidity and responsiveness of movements. Review in-game to see impact.
Lunch at the nearby ramen shop.
Prototype visual feedback for resource usage, such as character glows when using mana. Experiment with different colors, intensities, and animation curves.

Implement the chosen visual feedback effects into the game. Fine-tune the parameters to achieve a satisfying and informative visual cue for the player. Send update to @lpro-1 and @cdev-1 to check and provide feedback.
Document the visual feedback implementation and share it with the team. Briefly browse Reddit for funny memes.
